problem_text_cn: 如图,小伟设计两个直角三角形来测量河宽DE,他量得AD=20m,BD=15m,CE=45m,则河宽DE为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, Xiaowei designed two right triangles to measure the river width DE, he measured AD = N_0, BD = N_1, CE = N_2, then the width of the river DE is ()
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了相似三角形的应用,得出正确比例关系是解题关键．
